content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I was thinking of renting it out for 750 Euros a month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's too high for me. I can offer 650 Euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 650 Euros is quite low for an apartment like this in the city center. I can go down to 700 Euros, but that's the lowest I can go.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your generosity, but 700 Euros is still slightly high. I can offer 680 Euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 680 Euros is not acceptable for me, I'm sorry. I can meet you in the middle at 690 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still not satisfactory to me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
